Camping located in the town of Hormigos.
Family camping, very attentive staff.
It lacks nothing. Pool, river, showers, sinks, wc. All free.
It has a bar where they make all kinds of meals, they also serve breakfast.
It has a shop with daily bread.
Very spacious plots.
Emptying and filling of water and electricity points.
Highly recommended.

It is at the entrance of a farm but there is a lot of space and almost nobody passed

This is a very quiet town, it has three fountains in the center of the town, bakery, supermarket, butcher, pharmacy...
I recommend it, I have spent a few nights and you can sleep peacefully, it is 35 minutes from Madrid and 20 minutes from the Picadas dam, which is a spectacular natural site.

Without shadow.

title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Camino de Navaoncil

Unfortunately no views of the lake but it is calm at nights and shadowy in the morning. You can walk down to the lake where there's restaurants, water sports and climbing options. There's a public toilet at the lake.
